title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Minimum Conditions for Examining of Vegetable Species) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 121 of 2004) are amended by 
substituting in Regulation 2 for the definition of “Directive” (as amended by 
European Communities (Minimum Conditions for examining of Vegetable 
Species) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 519 of 2023) the 
following- 
“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive No. 2003/91/EC of 6 October 20032 
as amended by Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2024/2963 of 29th 
November 2024;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) regulation 2004 (s.i no 121 2004) amended substituting regulation 2 definition directive (as amended european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2023 (s.i no 519 2023) following- directive mean commission directive no 2003 91 ec 6 october 20032 amended commission implementing directive (eu) 2024 2963 29th november 2024

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 519 of 
2023) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 April, 2025. 

MARTIN HEYDON, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 O.J. EN Series, 02.12.2024, p. 17 
2 O.J. No. L254, 08.10.2003, p. 11 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [138] 3

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2024/2963 of 29th November 2024 which amends Council 
Directive 2003/91/EC as regards a derogation for CPVO and UPOV updated 
protocols, in particular as regards potato, safflower, cauliflower, sprouting 
broccoli, Brussels sprouts, kohlrabi, savoy cabbage, white cabbage, red cabbage, 
watermelon, lettuce, radish, corn salad and tomato rootstocks. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [138]
